text: ql -ayha alrswl- li'ahl alkitab min alyhwd walnsara: tealawa 'iilaa kalimat eadl wahaqa naltazim biha jmyeana: wahi 'ana nakhus allah wahdah balebadt, wala natakhidh 'aya sharik meh, min wthn 'aw snm 'aw slyb 'aw taghwt 'aw ghyr dhlk, wala yudin baeduna libaed baltaet min dun allh. fa'iin 'aeraduu ean hadhih aldaewat altayibat faquluu lahum - 'ayuha almuminun -: ashhaduu ealayna bi'anaa muslimun mnqadwn lrbna balebwdyt wal'ikhlas. waldaewat 'iilaa kalimat swa', kama tujjah 'iilaa alyhwd walnsara, twjjah 'iilaa min jaraa mjrahm
